definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Moreover, Huang Jingao had developed secret codes with the mistresses .
sentences.chinese: 此外，黃金高還與每位情婦都商定了幽會暗號。

sentences.english: The countersign of the bill are five- point stars that are dotted everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 此鈔暗號是點綴在其各處的五角星。

sentences.english: The scarlet cord was a sign to the spies she wanted to be rescued by them.
sentences.chinese: 硃紅線繩是給探子們的暗號，告訴他們她想獲救。

sentences.english: This had been the signal in old times when Wildeve had used to come secretly wooing to her.
sentences.chinese: 這本是韋狄從前祕密向她求愛的時候用的暗號。

sentences.english: Seriously, those are signals hat you need to explore.
sentences.chinese: 說真的，它們是你需要去探索的暗號。

sentences.english: Came to the guerrillas, chu head and Bai Cong snow interconnection of codes.
sentences.chinese: 來到游擊隊，楚團長和白叢雪互接暗號。

sentences.english: He could also use the code to create a message that you could read.
sentences.chinese: 他還可以使用暗號創建您能夠讀懂的消息。

sentences.english: Along the way, plum leave a handkerchief do sign, intentionally by keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 一路上，梅子故意留下手帕做暗號，被李劍察覺。

sentences.english: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?
sentences.chinese: 耶穌對他說，猶大，你用親嘴的暗號賣人子嗎。

sentences.english: It was like the two halves of a countersign .
sentences.chinese: 這倒像個接頭暗號分成了兩半。

sentences.english: They were not sending signals to each other under the card table last night.
sentences.chinese: 他們昨晚在牌桌底下沒有互遞暗號。
